entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 24. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
